GET:
WITH logged_user AS (
            SELECT
                user_id,
                user_is_admin,
                user_is_inactive
            FROM users u
            JOIN session s ON u.user_id = s.session_user_id
            WHERE (#string:session-token# IS NOT NULL) AND (s.session_token = #string:session-token#)
            LIMIT 1
        )

        SELECT 
            tlu.trapline_user_id as id,
            tlu.trapline_user_user_id as user_id,
            tlu.trapline_user_trapline_id as trapline_id,
            tlu.trapline_user_admin as admin
        FROM
            logged_user lu,
            trapline_user tlu
        WHERE
            (lu.user_is_inactive = false) AND
            ((lu.user_is_admin = true) OR (tlu.trapline_user_user_id = lu.user_id)) AND
            ((#bigint:id# IS NULL) OR (tlu.trapline_user_id = #bigint:id#)) AND
            ((#bigint:user-id# IS NULL) OR (tlu.trapline_user_user_id = #bigint:user-id#)) AND
            ((#bigint:trapline-id# IS NULL) OR (tlu.trapline_user_trapline_id = #bigint:trapline-id#)) AND
            ((#boolean:admin# IS NULL) OR (tlu.trapline_user_admin = #boolean:admin#))
        GROUP BY
            tlu.trapline_user_id
        ORDER BY
            tlu.trapline_user_id
